text:
Yo Abha! 
You're sweet, smart, wholesome and caring- all in one! Will always remember how most of your sentences started with "yarrr" when we talked :p Always stay the awesome person you are, and let's meet again pls someday? 
Lots of love <3
author: Priyal  Bhandari

text:
Heyooo
Did I ever tell you how much I love your smile? It's contagious :') 
You add a spark to every gathering/party and just being with you is so much fun. Never ever let go of your fun-loving bindaass nature, and maybe teach me to be like that pls :p 
Our trip to Udaipur and those drunk nights will always be one of my favourite college memories, thanks for being a part of that <3 
Love you, take care :))
author: Priyal  Bhandari

text:
Kaise ho dost?
There are a very few people who have been with me from the very start to the end of my iitk journey and I am glad you were one of them. We had so much in common na first-year main, after a point it was like-arey yahan bhi! hehe. So many things to say and express, the most important being a huge huge THANK YOU. Thank you mujhe bigadne ke liye, for helping me open up, for lending me a helping hand, and for being there when I needed a shoulder to cry on, not many people do that <3
Mumbai chalte hain na jaldi please, too much to explore. 
Here's to hoping I become as cool as you some day :p (keep giving tips thnx) 
Love you, take care
author: Priyal  Bhandari

text:
Adzooooo!!! Mess chalen?
I shall always be in debt to CS for making me meet people like you, working with you is fun, just sitting down and doing nothing together is fun, making fun of other team members together is fun, dancing with you is fun, trying out new dresses with you is fun, you bullying me is NOT FUN :p
Yar Mumbai aaja na, kitna kuch karna hai. You're still a complete mystery to me still but so glad that you were such a beautiful part of my IITK journey. Thoda humme bhi text kara karo madam :p
Really hope you have an amazing time at AmEx and then leave it for RBI :p
Another trip soon plsss, so much more to do!
Baki baatein vc pe :** 
Love youuuu <3
author: Priyal  Bhandari

text:
oh man do I start with your humble nature or your dark side or with your wholesome messages or the fun side? You're a full complete package! One of the perks of working with CS was getting to meet people like you, always grateful for that. Bas ab kitna bhaav khayega!
Through thick and thin, through happiness and pain, you're someone who has always been my constant.
It's amazing how automatically my hand goes to text you when even the smallest of inconvenience happens in my life, even more amazing is how you manage to be there for me in all those times. 
Now while you find some 1000 grammatical mistakes in this memoir, I just want you to know that you're special, you really really are so you better give yourself a lot of love ok that's an order! 
Digu, digs, komal, emmanuel, dker, LL, raju, digumarthi love you all <3
Pls meet soon naaa
author: Priyal  Bhandari

text:
I guess you must be finding my excitement about you being in PwC weird by now lol ( I am judging myself too dw :p ) But for what I know it is sure going to be a fun, adventurous ride. upgrad main to full fraud maar rhe, kaam main hopefully we do better :p
Looking forward to a lot of bitching sessions and parties in Mumbai! 
Take care <3
author: Priyal  Bhandari

text:
kkrh?
Disclaimer: This memoir won't be able to express even half of my feeling for you but anyway here we go.
Thank you for being a part of so many of my journeys be it Allen, IITK or internship, and making all of them super fun and beautiful. Through all the ups and downs, fun and games, tears and joy, I have learnt a lot from you and will keep admiring you for your caring nature. uff bahut tareef ho gayi weird lag raha :p I know this is gonna annoy you so much and so definitely gonna say " kitni patli ho gayi hai moti ho ja" :p Let's make some badass reels (like you know who :p ), have good movie nights (pls) and gossip our way through this pandemic. We HAVE to settle in the same city and make many more amazing memories, that should be a rule! 
Until then, take care, love you so much <3
author: Priyal  Bhandari

text: Hey Ayush! It's been a pleasure to see you come out of your shell and try out new things, hope you get to do so in the future as well. Appreciate how you are unapologetically yourself, unlike many others. Well, I made you try out your new drink but here's to hoping you make me try out some new drinks in the future :)) All the very best, stay in touch <3
author: Priyal  Bhandari

text:
Yo Deeksha!! I love the enthusiasm and positive vibes you bring with you everywhere. Could not implement our saree plan but let's hope we get to do it some day in future!! Photoshoot was so much fun, something I'll always cherish. 
Wishing you all the happiness and success in life. Take care <3
author: Priyal  Bhandari

text:
"Upgrad kar rahi kya" :p
Here's to hoping we are able to survive the PwC journey together while having lots of fun on the way. Can't wait to chill with you in Mumbai, pay huge rent but then also attack all the Zara and HnM stores out there. See you soon! <3
author: Priyal  Bhandari

text:
Hello Faizan!!
I shall always cherish our first-year hangouts and our last RM party. Totally admire your smile and humble nature. Shuffle karna sikhana if ever meet in future ok :p Till then wishing you lots of happiness and good luck. Take care <3
author: Priyal  Bhandari

text:
I really loved how you would always pass a smile whenever you saw me anywhere, many a times that smile made my day when my mood was crappy :))
Take care, wishing you all the happiness <3
author: Priyal  Bhandari

text:
Diiipaaaakkkkk!!! Bro kitna mast insaan hai yaar tu :p
How easy it is to vibe with you is something I'll always remember about you. Love how you're always up for any stupid activity I suggest and it's crazy how you manage your time so well (teach me pls). Also, let's just ditch digu and sagnik and let us both only complete our reel sessions. Jab bade aadmi ban jao, tab duaaon main yaad rakhna :P 
Will miss you a lot and will never let you get rid of me so easily. All the very best for your future <3
author: Priyal  Bhandari

text:
okkk here's attempt#2 lol
Diiiipaakkk broooo, "Kitna mast insaan hai yar tu" :))
I honestly don't remember when did we get so close (acads team huh) but I am super glad that I got to know you so well. Just love how easy it is to vibe with you and how you're always up for any stupid activity I suggest. Let's just ditch Sagnik and Digu and let us both make some cool reels. It is amazing how well you manage your time (teach me pls)  and how much effort you put into all your friendships. Future main Jab bada aadmi ban jaye toh duaaon main yaad rakhna :p
Well there is soooo much more to say but I am gonna do that face to face because we HAVE to meet soon. Take care dost, love you <3

text:

I shall always remember you as the sweet and kind one with whom I have not had much interaction but always felt some kind of bond. Thank you for being so cheerful and smiling whenever we met anywhere, it always felt so good <3 I would love for us to spend some more time together if and when we get a chance in the future. Until then, wishing you lots of happiness and success. Take care <3
author: Priyal  Bhandari

text:
Hello fellow Kotaite, not even sure if this is what we call Kota people, that's how much fucks we give to this city right? :p 
I have no clue why we got to interact with each other so late especially when we shared the same branch and city but nevertheless, it has always been a good and fun interaction, however little. Let's keep making fun of Rishabh and CoolDude69 and have long group video calls. I still have some pics with you from our party at 50ml and they are very cute ( can totally see you making fun of bhand Priyal but ok ) Let's find some good places in Kota to chill at ( lol who am I kidding)  and meet soon! 
Take care <3
author: Priyal  Bhandari

text:
Hi Pradeep!
I think most of our interaction was during the bsbe labs where all of us would be in a hurry to just get done with the experiments. Pulkit and I could not have managed the experiments without you so thank you. Hope you achieve lots of happiness and success in the future. Take care!
author: Priyal  Bhandari

text:
*Eats soya sticks in class, gets caught by Bindal Sir, smirks, continues eating*
This is truly Pragya for me! Love the energy and enthusiasm you put into anything and everything you do. Looking forward to meeting you soon ( and stealing some of your headbands) 
Love you!!
author: Priyal  Bhandari

text:
*rose emoji*
Namaste, kaise ho? 
Thanks for not telling anyone how I fell from my cycle and how you did not make even the slightest effort to pick me up from the ground :) I remember how you and Arun made fun of my legs in our first year, hated you both from the bottom of my heart but kinda knew I shall be having a lot of fun with you idiots. Tuesday catchups can still be a thing, albeit virtually but let's do it? 
Hope to see you soon some day and do nain matakka again <3
author: Priyal  Bhandari

text:
"Room pe aaja"
Oh man, I am gonna miss this so much! Well writing this memoir is not easy simply because there is so much to say and express but most importantly how much I wish that I could tell you all of this face to face. You have been a big ( also tall :p ) and beautiful part of my IITK journey and there is nothing but gratitude to express. Thanks for helping me come out of my shell, for giving the best advice, for being my go-to friend, for teaching me some really cool dance moves, for being approachable always, and most importantly for making me understand my self-worth which had hit its all-time low during the second year. I am always gonna be grateful for being able to go to campus for one last time have so much fun with you. I so do not want to believe that this is the end of my IITK journey but hey let's call it the start of a new chapter of my life of which I would really love you to be a part of again and so pls pls pls let's meet soon and stay connected ( Tujhe set up bhi toh karvana hai ) In the end, I think I have only one thing left to say.....Are you lost babygirl? 
Love youuuuu
author: Priyal  Bhandari

text:
Yo Kachari!!
You were a very important part of my first year and I am glad we had so much in common. You're a sweetheart and I will always remember the times we spent together. Going to classes and mess together, teasing Riya for that muffin, laughing on the lamest jokes, and exchanging those smiles whenever we met- shall miss all of this but hope we meet again someday soon. 
Take care <3
author: Priyal  Bhandari

text:
Hi Priyanshu!
You were the first boy I talked to in IITK and every interaction with you since then has been amazing. I have always admired your humble nature and will always remember the special gift you gave me on my birthday. I am sure you'll reach heights of success through your hard work and dedication. Wishing you lots of happiness. Take Care <3

text:
Hello there! You were one of the first few people I met at IITK and I am glad we stayed connected until the end and here's to hoping we stay connected in the future as well. Definitely bsbe would not have been the same without you and by this, yes I mean your annoying doubts :p, but also our chilling sessions. Wishing you all the very best for your future endeavours, I know you'll do great!
Take care, stay in touch <3
author: Priyal  Bhandari

text:
Tune toh insta pe pics bhejna hi band kar diya yar :p 
Mazza aya tha jab galti se story pe daal diya tha tune lol
RM jaisi parties aur karni hai Mumbai main, so here's to hoping we meet soon! 
You're too talented and I hope one day this talent makes you super famous 
Take care <3
author: Priyal  Bhandari

text:
Hey Ritesh!
I remember seeing you during our core team selections and thinking there is someone in the room who speaks softer than me :p Let's have a UNO battle soon to make up for the lack of interaction we've had in campus :p 
Hope you achieve lots of success and happiness in future, take care <3
author: Priyal  Bhandari

text:
Hiiiii Ritikaaaaa!!! ( yes I guess I am gonna steal Vipul's style)
I am gonna miss coming to your room to borrow almost all sorts of things from your kettle to cycle keys.  As I have said before, I really admire you for coming out of your comfort zone and trying out the different courses that people like me are afraid of trying, hats off! Having bulla sessions with you has always been so much fun and please promise me we'll have many more such sessions ( apna ghar itna bhi due nahi hai yar :p ) Here's to hoping you get placed in the company of your choice, earn lotsss of money and then pamper me and Tomar :))  Love youuuu <3
author: Priyal  Bhandari

text:
Hello KanpuRiya :p 
I still remember how I thought your sister was my roommate on the first day of college hehe. Remember the late-night talks we 3 used to have sometimes while lying on our beds, that was wholesome and something I'll always remember. I turned out to be a traitor and left our wing soon :p but A606 will always have a special place in my heart, all thanks to you and Priyakhee. Wishing you all the happiness and success in the future and I really hope we meet again someday. 
Take care <3
author: Priyal  Bhandari

text:
"Sometimes I'll start a sentence, and I don't even know where it's going. I just hope I find it along the way." Yup, this is me while writing your memoir cuz man there is soooo much to express, I don't know how to do it. I remember meeting you for the first time during core team selection and how you just barged out of the room when they called out your name. I was like wow so dramatic :p. From judging you for being dramatic that day to being dramatic with you, we have definitely come a long way. I am so glad we had those deep conversations during summers and came to know how similar (or dissimilar)  we are. I love how you add a spark to every party or hangout session and I missed this spark a lot during these last two months on the campus. Will always remember the first day at Goa when you took Arzoo and me for a "ahem" session bahar. Really admire how fit you've become now and totally don't feel good about how much I suck at losing weight :P Whichever path you choose in the future, wishing you lots of good luck for that, you'll for sure do well!
Love you dost, miss you "bahuuttt hi zyaddaaa" <3
P.S. Treat de bc
author: Priyal  Bhandari

text:
CCD at 7?
I am thankful to Pragya for many things, but making me meet you tops the list. I remember thinking in the very start- A* Allen, CSE damn he must be very studious. Skip to 4 years later, " Shreyash class ajaya kar kabhi" :p I have enjoyed a lottt with you, from our ccd hangouts to random strolls, and oh how can I forget the trip-why was I so rude to you lol. You've been my partner in crime in pretty much everything but I hate you for not texting me often, you better work on that. We should have made a reel together yar, but I hope we meet soon someday and then pakka we'll make a reel that matches your level of cringe ok :p We rarely talk about emotional stuff but I'll use this opportunity to say, thank you. You have been there for me (knowingly or unknowingly ) in some of my most sad times and you always managed to cheer me up. Will always remember the Abhishek Upmanyu show and the time we spend in Liquid after that, one of the best nights in those 4 years
I wish you all the luck to survive one more year of college without me :p
Miss you a lot, Love you <3
author: Priyal  Bhandari

text: Petition to lock Shreyash in a room alone whenever he gets drunk
author: Priyal  Bhandari

text:
Hey Srajit!
Glad we met on the Goa trip, it was so much fun to get to know you two. Also, I am pretty sure I would not have been able to eat that much food alone so actually thank you for helping me out with that :p 
Take care and stay safe <3
author: Priyal  Bhandari

text:
Hello!
We got to talk to each other quite late in our IITK journey but cheers to the new journey we shall be hopping on together soon. Till then let's keep our spirits and hopes of going to Mumbai high :p 
See you soon <3
author: Priyal  Bhandari

text:
Hellooo
I shall always remember the Hiiii Priyalll and the smile you gave me whenever you saw me anywhere. You're so full of energy and positive vibes, it's amazing! 
Hope to see you again someday, until then take care <3
author: Priyal  Bhandari

text:
Tantaannnnn, my lovely date :")
 Ok firstly, how? How do you manage to be sooo sweet and humble all the time? thak nahi jate? :p 
You're a delight to be with, there is so much I admire about you. Tum na hote toh Orientation'19 ka kya hota God knows. I so want to spend a lot more time with you like we did in summers and so plsss let's plan a trip soon, is baar aa jana chup chaap :p
Will never stop teasing you for your story telling skills lol but you have my heart tantan <3
You shall always be my cute perfect date until we find someone else for you (she better be fucking amazing like you are) Take care Tantan, love you a lot <3
author: Priyal  Bhandari

text:
Helloooo!!
Firstly, thank you so much for introducing The Office to me, best suggestion ever :p
Will never forget the sparkle in your eyes when you came to tell me about Stanford ( well let's leave aside the visa part shall we) and the excitement you show when talking about JoshiSir. Absolutely love how you're always up for any activity I suggest and it is always so much fun to hang out with you. I am so happy we got to go on a trip together and I hope we are able to plan more such trips in the future. I don't think I ever said this but going to Silent DJ with you was one of the most fun experiences I have had in college :)) I really hope we meet again someday so that I get to say, "I cannot believe you came", TWSS :p 
Lots of love <3
author: Priyal  Bhandari

text:
" yar padha kya" 
Cribbing along with you about all sorts of stuff was our way of vibing, although we should totally stop crying so much lol. Bsbe became a bit tolerable, thanks to friends like you. I Will miss our gossip sessions but I know the distance won't stop us from doing that anyway :p  Dancing with you was so much fun, you were so on fire that day NOT :p 
Tune itne dog videos share kiye that I got one imagine hehe. Marshy se milne aa jaldi before she grows up and maybe tab mujhse bhi mil lena :p 
I hope you survive one more year in college and then shadi karlena jaldi se (you know why) , padhai and job toh hoti rahegi lol 
Thanks for being an amazing friend and a big support. I Will miss our bsbe trio a lotttt
Take care <3
author: Priyal  Bhandari

text:
Yo Utsav! It's amazing how much warmth you show to anyone you meet and I am glad I got to know you in IITK. You're one of the most humble people I know, always stay that way :))
Wishing you lots of happiness and success in life and hoping our paths cross again in future 
Take care!
author: Priyal  Bhandari

text:
Henlos
Have always enjoyed doing all the random stuff with you from playing heads up on events ground to clicking random pictures and discussing The Office episodes. Please keep sharing dog reels and The Office crossovers. Enjoy dosas and idlis in Chennai :p 
Take care, hope to meet you soon <3
author: Priyal  Bhandari

text:
Helloooo
Thanks for clicking those cool pictures ( ours not yours :p ) That game night in CBG was so much fun, will never forget the Bengali Avalon :p 
Take care!
author: Priyal  Bhandari

text:
Hey Yash!! ( is it weird that I feel like calling you Kuwade cuz that's what I have heard from everyone :p )
KGMU trip was soooo good, loved playing all sorts of games with you people in the night. Remember "oka"? lol, still haunts me. I wish we could have enjoyed more such experiences in college but nevertheless let's hope we get such a chance in the future. Take care <3

text:
I pledge to never drunk text/call anyone :p 
Although that vc was weirdly funny ( not for others though lol ) 
P.S. Still embarrassed :)
author: Priyal  Bhandari

text:
Hellooo
I am still in awe of the numerous things you're good at and how you manage each one of them so well, hats off! Discussions heated toh hone hi chahye, tabhi mazza aata hai :p  The enthusiasm you brought along with you to every meeting or work was amazing and refreshing in its own way
I hope we get to dance together one more time, Arun ko bhi lelenge tab :p
WIshing you lots of success and happiness ahead 
Lots of love <3
author: Priyal  Bhandari

text:
Bsbe Gawd, 
I was going through my initial chats with you one day when we had just started talking and oh God why was I so snobbish :p But then too you were always so helpful and humble. People like you made me hate bsbe a little less and made studying its courses a little more tolerable. Thank you for that. It's amazing how you put in all your effort into something you decide to pursue and have always admired that. You're one of the sweetest persons I have ever met, pls remain the same. The sparkle in your eyes when you discussed pokemon or cricket with Utakrsh (while I stood there clueless) is unforgettable and funny in its own way. You know our deal and so never letting you get disconnected from me (however famous you become later :p ) 
Take care, shall miss the trio a lot <3
author: Priyal  Bhandari

text:
Hellooo
I think we've interacted more on texting than in person right? Still tu itna comfortable feel karata hai as if we are childhood buddies :p Thank you for the numerous pieces of advice you throw at me even when I don't ask for them :p  ( joking....NOT)  It will always be difficult for me to match your level of enthusiasm and energy but I shall keep trying. Could not say a proper goodbye to each other but that only means we have to meet again soon. Until then, take care, stay safe and keep texting! 
Lots of love <3
author: Priyal  Bhandari
